definition: sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])

sentences.english: In this paper, a new technique about long distance source localization with passive synthetic aperture sonar array is presented.
sentences.chinese: 该文讨论了被动合成孔径声呐远程定位问题。

sentences.english: They only need hang put the type sound to hang put to the water.
sentences.chinese: 它们只需把吊放式声呐吊放到水中。

sentences.english: On the modern anti-submarine warfare helicopter is loaded with keen hangs puts the type sound or the sound buoy.
sentences.chinese: 现代反潜直升机上装有灵敏的吊放式声呐或声呐浮标。

sentences.english: On the modern anti-submarine warfare helicopter is loaded with keen hangs puts the type sound or the sound buoy.
sentences.chinese: 现代反潜直升机上装有灵敏的吊放式声呐或声呐浮标。

sentences.english: Flow noise in the interior fluid of a vector hydrophone towed linear array is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 研究矢量拖曳式线列阵声呐护套管内的流噪声场。

sentences.english: Having been suggested by a bat, people invented sonar.
sentences.chinese: 受到蝙蝠的启发，人们发明了声呐。

sentences.english: The method of the BVR location of towed linear array sonar on the warship;
sentences.chinese: 研究矢量拖曳式线列阵声呐护套管内的流噪声场。
